attributes.action: Pubs and restaurants should receive more help like the first lockdown
attributes.additional_details: I am a pub landlord and like most pub landlords we are struggling with no income and still have to pay rent and bills every month keep me shut until next year until the vaccine is out long as you help us with funding
attributes.background: Give more funding to pubs and restaurants like the first lockdown between 10k 20k every 3/4 months to keep it afloat until the country goes back to normality
